answers.author: Jacqueline Wedding-Scott
answers.text:
Hi Jewel,   
I have just retired from the City of Centennial, CO.  As the CM in Centennial (new City), we contracted for virtually 80% of our services - including, law enforcement, public works, animal services, building inspecting/permitting, revenue administration, etc.  In 2008, we transitioned our entire public works services from our contract with the County to a private provider.  I would be happy to discuss our approach with you in more detail.  But, suffice it to say...it was enormously successful.
